channel.title: Love Otudor
channel.description: A blog on mobile development, and my journey as woman in tech. Written by Love Otudor, Mobile Developer

item.title: A post with a cover image
item.description: Markdown is intended to be as easy-to-read and easy-to-write as is feasible. Readability, however, is emphasized above all else. A Markdown-formatted document should be publishable as-is, as plain text, without looking like it's been marked up with tags or formatting instructions.

item.title: Markdown test file
item.description: Markdown is intended to be as easy-to-read and easy-to-write as is feasible. Readability, however, is emphasized above all else. A Markdown-formatted document should be publishable as-is, as plain text, without looking like it's been marked up with tags or formatting instructions.

item.title: Say hello to Gridsome ðŸŽ‰
item.description: A new static site generator baby is born. It's highly inspired by Gatsby.js (React based) but built on top of Vue.js. We have been working on it for a year and will have a beta ready soon. You can expect this baby to grow up fast!
